content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you needing assistance with electrical, plumbing, or HVAC services?
Yeah, I need someone to check some outlets that stopped working this morning.
I can help you schedule an appointment for electrical service to check your outlets. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, Mike. Could you please provide your address so I can verify that you're within our service area?
Thanks! Let me check if your address is within our service area.
I'm having trouble verifying your address in our system right now. Let me get a human representative to assist you.
reason: Unable to calculate service area due to a system error.

content: Hi Mike, my name is Judy—I'm stepping in to help! I see you're at 742 West Summit Avenue and need electrical service for your outlets. We do serve your area, and I can help finish scheduling your appointment. What day and time works best for you?
Any chance you can send someone today?
Let me check our calendar—yes, we have an opening this afternoon between 2pm and 4pm. Should I book that slot for you?
You're all set! Our electrician will arrive between 2pm and 4pm today. If you have any more questions or need to reschedule, just reply to this message.
